disclaimer_start: Disclaimer: The following architectural design is provided as general guidance based on standard practices and Vastu principles. It should not be considered professional advice. For tailored designs, consult a certified architect.

rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Living Area
rooms.description: Spacious foyer with direct access to garden and parking area. Follows Vastu guidelines by placing the main entrance on the north-east side for positive energy.

rooms.name: Dining Room & Kitchen
rooms.description: Open plan space allowing natural light from east-facing windows. The kitchen designed with functional storage and ventilation in compliance with Vastu, ideally placed in the southeast corner.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Includes private balcony on the north side for ample morning light. Follows Vastu by maintaining a balance between water and fire elements.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious with private balcony on the east side ensuring a peaceful environment. Includes an en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Provides private balcony on the north for light exposure. Designed in harmony with Vastu principles regarding space utilization.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with private balcony on the west side to balance energy flow according to Vastu.

rooms.name: Dressing Room / Study
rooms.description: Multipurpose room offering storage and study space. Positioned near master bedroom for convenience.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with a private balcony to the south side for afternoon light and Vastu alignment. Includes built-in storage.

rooms.name: Bedroom 5
rooms.description: The final bedroom in this triplex bungalow offering privacy and a modest private balcony on the west side.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: Expansive open area offering panoramic views, designed for relaxation and outdoor entertainment. Equipped with a seating arrangement, pergola, and space for private gym equipment.

openings.description: Provides access from upper level to rooftop terrace.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Fully equipped gym with modern fitness equipment, adequate ventilation and lighting, designed following local norms and Vastu guidelines for energy balance.
